DOC.brief_summary: The aim clinical study demonstrate safety immunogenicity Fluzone vaccine . Objective : - To describe safety 2012-2013 formulation Fluzone vaccine , administer 1- 2-dose schedule , accordance Advisory Committee Immunization Practices ( ACIP ) recommendation , child 6 month < 9 year age . Observational Objectives : - To describe immunogenicity 2012-2013 formulation Fluzone vaccine , administer 1- 2-dose schedule accordance ACIP recommendation , child 6 month < 9 year age . - To submit remain available sera subject Center Biologics Evaluation Research ( CBER ) analysis World Health Organization ( WHO ) , Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) , Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) support selection recommendation strain subsequent year ' influenza vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Among Healthy Children Receiving Fluzone® Influenza Virus Vaccine ( 2012-2013 Formulation )
DOC.detailed_description: All participant receive Fluzone vaccine Visit 1 . For subject receive 2 dos influenza vaccine , per ACIP guidance , second dose Fluzone vaccine administer Visit 2 . Total duration participation study approximately 28 day participant receive 1 dose 56 day receive 2 dos Fluzone vaccine .
